title: Linotype FontExplorer for Windows... When?
content:
Does anyone knows when is it coming out? The beta sucks :\

 [‹ FontXChange](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213927/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43992 "Go to previous forum topic") [Paper for Bookbinding ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213927/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43927 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Freeza

comments.content: I couldn’t tell you, but it’ll be well worth waiting for if it’s even half as good as the Mac version. Honestly it’s the only font management app I’ve ever got along with. It makes font management a joy which is exactly opposite to the experience of Suitcase Confusion or any of the others including FontAgent.

Yeah i know... i use it for mac, but the windows version is full of bugs, but yeah ok.. its the beta version. Anyways I’m only complaining cus it just stopped working today... and back I went to the not so good Suitcase

-

[www.nunocoelho.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415213927/http:/www.nunocoelho.com/ "www.nunocoelho.com")
